entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cypress Hills Provincial Park 6:00 PM CST Sunday 19 March 2023
Temperature: -1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 51 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -10.1°C
Wind: NNE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8 except minus 1 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8 except minus 1 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening with 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 March 2023
